emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight Alpha Kappa Alpha members, from left: Evelyn V. Waters, Mary H. Page, Ruth B. Guyn, Lillian H. Adams, Lois S. Curry, Emmalene Hayes, and Geri Reynolds, gathered around table to finalize debutante cotillion plans, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 11 reads: "AKA Cotillion Committee - Pictured making final plans for the third annual AKA Debutante Cotillion, to be held Feb. 20, in Syria Mosque, are, from left to right: Evelyn V. Waters, Mary H. Page, Ruth B. Guyn, Lillian H. Adams, Lois S. Curry, Emmalene Hayes and Geri Reynolds. - Harris Photo."
